Html:
Hi all,

I am using the mechanism to publish KiGG posts to a Twitter account. I noticed two diffferent entries appearing in Twitter. These entries have the prefix ''PUBLISHED'' or ''NEW"". So far so good.

I have two questions. What is the difference between PUBLISHED and NEW? There are many PUBLISHED entries and only a few NEW entries. My second question, I noticed that sometimes the same entries are published twice to Twitter with several minutes interval. Anyone any idea why this happens?

The site can be viewed at: http://www.PartijPolitiekNieuws.nl (about political news in the Netherlands).

Thanks for any help!

Regards,

Jos
An update. I see that everytime I publish a post on the site, 15 new entries are published to Twitter.
